title: Large Fries and a Large Iced Coffee

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Go to McDonalds and buy large fries and a large iced coffee.
- Ask someone to watch your belongings in exchange for medium fries.
**Sin of Fast Food** - If you are the last Fallen Angel, open your own McDonalds at your home. You may choose to serve your customers so much food, that their ability's effect doesn't take place, and they die the next night.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- The salt from the fries fills you with rage, while the coffee fills you with energy. The next night, you may attack as many people as you've ever gotten fries and coffee.
- While you're at McDonalds, all visits against you fail.
- You may go to McDonalds multiple times in a row.
- Asking someone to watch over your belongings roleblocks them. The medium fries do nothing, but they're pretty tasty!
- Asking a Fallen Angel to watch your belongings will also allow you to go to McDonalds the same night. You also bypass roleblock immunity.
- Attacking a Fallen Angel will allow you to go to McDonalds twice tomorrow.
